hero.title: Designer, Frontend Developer & Mentor
hero.text:
I’m a developer and UX/UI designer based in the U.S. with extensive experience in digital consulting. Passionate about minimal and brutalist design, I draw inspiration from nature, art, and a good cup of coffee.

[Learn more](https://docs.netlify.com/frameworks/eleventy/)
